TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataBoundControl

Docs.summary: Defines properties that are shared by data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This interface provides access to properties shared by data-bound controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ DataKeyNames { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.DataKeyNames : string[] with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary-key fields of the items that are displayed in a data-bound control.
Docs.value: An array that contains the names of the primary-key fields of the items that are displayed in a data-bound control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataMember { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataMember : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the list of data that the data-bound control binds to when the data source contains more than one list of data items.
Docs.value: The name of the list of data that the data-bound control binds to.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ DataSource { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.DataSource : obj with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the object from which the data-bound control retrieves a list of data items.
Docs.value: The object that contains the list of data that the data-bound control retrieves.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataSourceID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataSourceID : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the data source control from which the data-bound control retrieves a list of data items.
Docs.value: The ID of the data source control that contains the list of data items that the data-bound control retrieves.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataSourceObject As IDataSource
public: property System::Web::UI::IDataSource ^ DataSourceObject { System::Web::UI::IDataSource ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the data source object from which the data-bound control retrieves a list of data items.
Docs.value: The data source object that contains the list of data items that the data-bound control retrieves.
